opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Crawford, Interim Field Office Director, Portland, Immigration and Customs Enforcement v. Suarez Martinez

opinion:
541 U.S. 986

CRAWFORD, INTERIM FIELD OFFICE DIRECTOR, PORTLAND, IMMIGRATION AND CUSTOMS ENFORCEMENT, ET AL.
v.
SUAREZ MARTINEZ.

No. 03-878.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 19, 2004.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 540 U. S. 1217.] Motion of respondent for appointment of counsel granted. Christine S. Dahl, Esq., of Portland, Ore., is appointed to serve as counsel for respondent in this case.
